pages.text: To actually go into the $(bold)Void$(), one must have a proper understanding of several things. Research things that represent these words:$(li)Greed$(br)$(li)Emptiness$(br)$(li)Feeling of being Lost$(br)$(li)Fear$(br)$(br)(If you need hints or don't like puzzles, go to the last page of this section.)
Once successful, you can right-click on your $(d)Ominous Book$() to teleport into the $(bold)Void$(). Be wary, great dangers lie ahead...

Hints:$(br)$(li)For Greed, villagers tend to be selfish...$(li)For Lost, the answer is in the Nether$(li)For Emptiness, it's a block of the void (from this mod)$(li)For fear, a certain carved block has a frightful glare to it...
